name: ガメラ - ザ・タイム・アドベンチャー -
summary: The monster Gamera is back! The flying turtle is in a battle against many of the monsters he's defeated before in this adventure/RPG for Bandai's Playdia system.
info:
• 中文名: 加美拉：The Time Adventure
  • 别名: Gamera: The Time Adventure
  • 平台: Playdia
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 1995年03月22日
  • 发行: バンダイ
